title: Hecho Con Amor Deli
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Little bistro with tables and chairs out overlooking the football pitch with a children's playground opposite. Next to Hotel San Lucas. Has ovo-lacto vegetarian food including burgers from lentil, bean, or falafel plus wraps, soups, salads, empanada, and baked goods. Makes its jams and sauces. Has Wi-Fi and English book exchange. English and Spanish spoken. Call 1 or 2 days ahead and owner will make something to suit your diet.
